title: 'I'll just shoot him': Maine man accused of threatening President Trump | Flipboard
text:
'I'll just shoot him': Maine man accused of threatening President Trump
Kevin Bell, of Bridgton, has had previous interaction with federal investigators and says he also wanted to kill former President George W. Bush.
